name: Imagine Babyz
description:
• As a babysitter you’ll see all your babies grow up in 3D. Follow your
realistic babies through different development stages, from 6 to 18
months. Watch your babies develop their own unique personality and
abilities.

• Show off your babysitting skills & bond with babies like never before:

o Watch, hug & even talk to your baby via voice recognition

o Play peek-a-boo via facial recognition with the camera

o Take your baby to the park & watch him or her interact with other
babies. You can even meet other babies and players via StreetPass

• Travel to different countries to babysit: Choose your destination city
from San Francisco, Shanghai, Rome, Paris, Tokyo and more

• Customize your babies’ look and room and manage your budget to buy
baby clothes & accessories.

• Progress through the game and earn a great reputation as a popular
babysitter, allowing you to ultimately open your own day care business!
